name: MetaDOS
intro: A next-gen metaverse battle royale game
introduce: MetaDOS is a free, innovative Battle Royale game aiming to launch on the Subnet. MetaDOS players will battle with up to 200 players per match. Additionally, MetaDOS brings the “Time-as-currency concept” into a Battle Royale game. Each player will have a certain amount of Time when joining the game. As they run out, they are eliminated. Players will have to fight and loot Time inside the game to become the last one standing and earn rewards.
